body_html: No, we should definitely leave tensor sumall/meanall as they are right now, but we should expose non-synchronizing alternatives (e.g. for use in autograd, where we never return a scalar). Good idea with view + sum. It might break for non-contiguous inputs, but I guess we don't care about these cases very much (as most modules don't accept them anyway).
